column4: godzirra; you will not be able to ssh from ubuntu to windows. with putty youc an get from windows to ubuntu though
godzirra; are you using the right ip/hostnames? how do you have that set up in your router?
I am using the ip address of my linux box (192.168.1.99) and the router currently forwards all incoming requests on 1-80 and 631 to .99
Even odder, my laptop will connect to my linux box via putty, but my desktop will not.
